content: {"name": "Ethos East Boston Heritage Apt.", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Grocery Distribution is at the back of the East Boston Heritage Apt. office\nTo register to attend a Community Cafe meal program, please call 617-477-6688 or email ethosmeals@ethocare.org\n", "email": "", "url": "https://www.ethocare.org/services/nutrition/community-cafes/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "209 Sumner Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Jeffries Point", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02128", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3682094, "longitude": -71.0399106}, "phones": [{"number": "(617) 561-0040", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}]}
